person.persName: Thomas Edwin Moore (circuit court clerk, Pendleton, Confed. Capt.)

body.p: Born on February 15, 1831 in Pendleton County, Kentucky. Served as the Pendleton County Court Clerk in 1860. At the outbreak of the Civil War, Moore enlisted in the Confederate Army. by 1862, Moore was in command of Company D, 4th Kentucky Cavalry. Fought at Bull's Gap, where he was wounded and removed from active service. HE was sent back to Kentucky where he, under to command of Major O. G. Cameron surrendered on April 20, 1865. Moore died on August 5, 1921.
